meaningMnemonic: The <radical>commander</radical> radical and the <kanji>commander</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: Who is the <kanji>commander</kanji> of Japan? The <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう)! And if you ever say anyone else or vote for someone else or even THINK about someone else being the commander, he'll find you and cut off your head.
